ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend this class to a fellow student. I would describe it as an overview of ocean biogeochemical literature focusing on the impact of biological and physical inputs to the system and the implications for interpreting the fossil record. Additionally, the class has a practical focus on developing student's research skills through individual term projects on related topics.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course was relevant to everyone in the class despite differing dissertation focuses.

This class helped me to understand the ocean system better, which will greatly benefit my research. It has also introduced me to a geochemical perspective. The literature we reviewed was mostly new to me and broadened my understanding of paleontology in general. Also, the term project helped me understand the research process a little better, especially as it relates to small, concise projects.
